settings.label: Email list id
settings.info: When added, email list opt in checkbox will show in popup

settings.label: Trigger button text
settings.default: SOLD OUT - GET NOTIFIED WHEN BACK IN STOCK

settings.label: [OPTIONAL] Include tags
settings.info: A comma-separated list of product tags for which you want the back-in-stock button to show for. Case-sensitive. Leave blank to show for all products.

settings.label: [OPTIONAL] Exclude tags
settings.info: A comma-separated list of product tags for which you **do not** want the back-in-stock button to show for. Case-sensitive. Leave blank to show for all products.

settings.label: Headline
settings.info: The headline that appears at the top of the popup. Use {product_name} to to dynamically fetch the product title.

settings.label: Text content
settings.default: Register to receive a notification when this item comes back in stock.
settings.info: The text that appears inside the popup instructing the customer what to do.

settings.label: Button text
settings.info: The text within the submit button for this popup form.

settings.label: Success label text
settings.default: You're in! We'll let you know when it's back.
settings.info: The message that appears when someone successfully submits the popup form

settings.label: Email list opt-in label
settings.default: Add me to your email list.

settings.label: Footer content
settings.info: Optional text that will appear in the footer, below the submit button

settings.label: Background
settings.info: The background color of the popup form

settings.label: Text
settings.info: The text color of the popup form

settings.label: Button text
settings.info: The text color of the button on the popup form

settings.label: Button background
settings.info: The background color of the form's submit button

settings.label: Error background
settings.info: The background color of an error box that shows when there is an error submitting the form

settings.label: Error text
settings.info: The text color of the error message that shows when there is an error submitting the form

settings.label: Sucess background
settings.info: The background color of the success box that shows after someone submits the form successfully

settings.label: Success text
settings.info: The text color of the success message that shows after someone submits the form successfully
